Title: By the Beach/Swim Like a Fish
Plot:
This is the first episode from the TV series season Lights, Camera, Action, Wiggles.  It has a new intro from a studio, and many regular segments.

This one was mainly about the Beach.  

Song List
"Romp bomp a stomp"
"Camera One"
"The Monkey Dance"
"Lights, Camera, Action, Wiggles"
"Hats"
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
